Q: went to my doctor today with swollen toes and top of my foot,couldnt find anything significant but my kidney levels have dropped really low,tired all the time and difficulty walking all showing signs of kidney disease, I am not the doctor what do u suggest I should do
A: HelloThanks for query. You have swelling of the feet and toes with tiredness and generalized weakness This may be due to Kidney failure or Cardiac problem. Consult qualified Physician for clinical examination and get following basic tests done to arrive at probable cause of your symptoms .1) Mammogram 2) Routine Urine test 3) Renal function Test 4) ECG (Electron -Cardiogram)5)Liver Function TestsFurther treatment will be decided by him based on results of these tests and final diagnosis. Chat Doctor.
